Reviews.Content: Find somewhere else Average rooms.Small beds.People smoking outside the door.Sleazy neighbourhood.Noisy.Okay dinner available from Diner at the Days Inn next door.What little food was provided for breakfast was stale.But it is cheap and near the airport.
Reviews.Author: Noel-Donna

Reviews.Content: Nice, unpretentious motel The Super 8 is convenient for the airport, has a restaurant on the premises, and the staff are friendly. Pick from airport was speedy. Room was a bit above basic - large and spacious - and clean. Recommended.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
